Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory154.png'}

{3: 'The decks of the Nighter—a floating stronghold tasked with perimeter and maritime defense—is littered with the dead and dying, consequences of a costly battle against the Ascendant earlier in the day.'}
{3: 'Apart from the Nighter crew, there are also members of the Forsaken and the ACA, who have stayed to bolster the defense.'}
{3: 'Striding past them, Pulao can manage nothing more than nods of appreciation—she had more pressing matters to attend to.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Be careful! Lash the corners tight. Did they not teach you how to tie knots?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao is directing the Nighter crew to move the vast amounts of cargo still on board the ship.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'There is only so much that we can carry. All this precious cargo, supplies that have kept the Voyage afloat for all this time. A tragedy, to be honest......', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having lived on board for such a long time, Pulao has conflicted feelings about the Nighter.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "They've all scurried ashore and left this mess for me to clean up. The Nighter is so quiet—eh? Perhaps not so quiet after all.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Next to a haphazard collection of cargo, two bands of people are locked into a standoff. Judging by their outfits, neither belong to the crew.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "Enough, Akdilek scum! We've had enough of your nonsense!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'It is not nonsensical for the cargo to go to the highest bidder.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'What you call "highest bidder", I call "cutting in line"! The Nighter promised us this cargo. We had a deal!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'They would sell one of their own if the price was right. An oral contract means nothing to them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Hey! What are you all jabbering about!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Watanabe-San ordered us to procure supplies here. We will not leave empty-handed!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the tension reaches a boiling point between the two factions, hordes of Corrupted suddenly descend on the Nighter, plunging the deck into chaos.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "Boss, it's the Corrupted. They came out of nowhere.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Wave after wave of cretins to deal with today. So exhausting, right, Sophia?', 4: '1'}
{3: "At Jamilah's command, Sophia draws her Dual Guns, laying down suppressive fire and covering Jamilah's retreat."}
{3: "Ignoring Jamilah's jibes, the Forsaken draw their own weapons and face off against the Corrupted."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Akdileks...... stay out of this. This is a concern for the Forsaken alone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "(That Ascendant—Lamia—wasn't lying after all. She brought her Corrupted on board the ship.)", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Even the renowned Kowloong Constructs are being infected...... what is that mermaid up to?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "Watanabe-San, you're back? Sorry, we haven't secured the cargo yet, thanks to those meddling Akdileks!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'To the gentleman of the Forsaken late to our convocation, this matter is of our concern as well. The price for interrupting an Akdilek transaction is steep.', 4: '3'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Ladies and gentlemen of both the Akdilek and the Forsaken, my name is Pulao. I am, temporarily, the administrator of this vessel and its cargo. Allow me to present my resolution for the ownership of this shipment.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Whoever eliminates the most Corrupted...... shall receive "all of the cargo"!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "If that's the case, Sophia cannot lose.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Watanabe-San will not lose either, little girl!', 4: '1'}
